modName: Sustained Spells V2 Compatibility Patch For Skyre
summary: This is a small compatibility patch for Sustained Spells version 2.0 with Skyre version 1.3.01 and Skyre ReProccer Compatibility Patches version 3.7.4 (Although this last mod is not required)
descriptionHtml:
This is a quick little TES5edit generated patch for using Sustained spells in conjunction with Skyre, it just contains the file SustainedSpellsSkyrePatch.esp which must be placed in your load order after SustainedSpells.esp and SkyRe_Main.esp, if you use the Skyre ReProccer Compatibility Patches by qotsafan then it must be placed after all the esp with names beginning with qotsafans which is probably going to be the bottom of your load order.

Vesions used to create this patch:
Sustained Spells - 2.0 (Required)
T3nd0s Skyrim Redon - 1.3.01 (Required)
SkyRe ReProccer Compatibility Patches - 3.7.4 (Not Required)

This is my first mod, just uploading it because there appears to be a few people that would like to use these together.

Thanks to
MGoods for Sustained Spells (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13450/?)
T3nd0 for Skyrim Redone (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13450/?)
qotsafan for SkyRe ReProccer Compatibility Patches (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29375/?)
ElminsterAU, Hlp, Zilav and Sharlikran for TES5Edit (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?)
author: Drewkey
